Detailed Description

template<typename ValueType, typename LowerType = ValueType, typename UpperType = LowerType, typename CompareType = std::less<ValueType>>
struct boost::constrained_value::clipping< ValueType, LowerType, UpperType, CompareType >

An alias of bounded for bounded objects that clip the value to the bounds.
